metaDescription: Read our privacy policy explaining how we use Google Analytics and AdSense to improve our salary calculators while protecting your data.
title: Privacy Policy - SalaryWise.io
keywords: privacy policy, data protection, salary calculator privacy

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: SalaryWise.io collects limited anonymous information to improve our services and provide relevant advertising. All salary calculations are performed entirely in your web browser using JavaScript. Personal salary data remains on your device and is not transmitted to our servers. However, we use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our website and Google AdSense for advertising.

sections.heading: How Calculations Work
sections.content: Our calculators run locally in your browser. When you enter salary information, all processing happens on your device. We use mathematical formulas based on publicly available tax rates. While calculations are performed locally, we may use analytics tools to understand which calculators are most popular.

sections.heading: Cookies and Tracking
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and provide personalized advertising. This includes Google Analytics for website analytics and Google AdSense for displaying relevant advertisements. You can control your cookie preferences and opt out of personalized advertising through our cookie settings.

sections.heading: Third-Party Services
sections.content: We use several third-party services to provide our website functionality: Google Analytics for website analytics, Google AdSense for advertising, Google Fonts for typography, and Cloudflare for content delivery. These services may collect anonymous usage data according to their respective privacy policies. Google services are subject to Google's Privacy Policy.

sections.heading: Google Analytics and Advertising
sections.content: We use Google Analytics to understand how our website is used, which pages are most popular, and how users navigate through our salary calculators. This helps us improve our services. We also use Google AdSense to display relevant advertisements. Google may use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your online activities across websites. You can opt out of personalized advertising and analytics tracking through our cookie consent banner or by visiting Google's Ad Settings.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: Your personal salary calculation data remains entirely on your device and is not transmitted to our servers. However, analytics and advertising data collected by Google services is subject to Google's security measures and privacy policies. We recommend reviewing Google's privacy documentation for details about their data security practices.

sections.heading: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our services are not directed at children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are under 13, please do not use our calculators or contact us.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy occasionally. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.heading: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us through the contact page on our website.

universalDisclaimer.title: Important Notice
universalDisclaimer.content: The calculators and salary tools on this website are provided for informational purposes only. We do our best to provide accurate and up-to-date information, but we cannot guarantee the results. Actual salaries, taxes, and deductions may vary depending on your individual situation and local regulations. Users should not rely solely on this website for financial, legal, or tax decisions. Always consult with a qualified professional for advice. By using this website, you agree that SalaryWise.io is not responsible for any decisions or actions taken based on the calculator results.
